translated: The Collection of Long Discourses🔽The Chapter on the Elephant’s Stable
“It’s not right to feed a lump of food,

original: Na ca piṇḍaṁ na kuse na ghaṁsituṁ;
analyzed: na ca piṇḍam na kuse na
translated: nor to give almsfood on a blade of grass or a leaf.
I think it’s because of repeatedly seeing
that the elephant made love to the dog.”
The Repeatedly Seen Jātaka is the seventh.
